site.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a place where something important or interesting happened
site.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The house is built on the site of a medieval prison.
the site of the air crash
site.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: an area of ground where something is being built or will be built
site.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: He managed to get himself a job on a building site.
the site of a proposed missile base
a site for a new airport
site.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a place that is used for a particular purpose
site.translation[0].note_box[0].sections: Archaeological sites are often discovered by accident.
There are numerous historic sites to visit.
The organization maintains and restores ancient sites, castles, monuments etc.
Ayers Rock is the most sacred site of the Aborigines.
A Bronze Age burial site has been discovered.
Wreckage was seen 200 metres away from the crash site.
the bomb sites of war-torn London
He has worked on various building sites.
We want to shift the balance of housing development from greenfield to brownfield sites.
The majority of the houses will be built on brownfield sites.
First they had to look for a camp site.
A well-run caravan site near the river brings holidaymakers into the village.
Recycling reduces the volume of waste which goes into landfill sites.
The area is to be redeveloped as an industrial site.
There were photos of a missile site under construction.
Normally the male swan wonâ€™t let other swans near his nesting site.
site.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to place or build something in a particular place
site.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Some of this new housing has been sited in inner city areas.
site.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: an area of ground that is used or is going to be used for a particular purpose
site.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: On any building site, falling is the most frequent type of accident.
The Sunnyvale City Council last week approved a 186-unit apartment complex on the 4.5 acre site.
Solectron employs 2,200 people at sites in San Jose and Milpitas.
site.translation[2].definitions[1].defin: a WEBSITE (=place on the Internet where you can find information about something)
site.translation[3].definitions[0].defin: be placed or built in a particular area
site.translation[3].definitions[0].examp: The new factory is to be sited in Fort Collins.
